name: Another Autumn Morning.
description:
"Another Autumn Morning" is little one-room-explore game with a BIG plot twist. :0

Made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022. ~~~ :>

Playtime : 5-10 mins

Please play with audio!

_______

This is my first ever RPG Maker MV game, game jam, playable browser game, and game finished within a week! :D 

I might update or repolish this in the future! Please tell me if there are any bugs/typing mistakes. Kind comments and suggestions are always welcomed! :)

Please follow my Instagram @maho.nii_anpu !! I have so much to say about this game later teehee :3
